name: genie-renderer
description: Processing script for the creation of image/PDF assets from GenieHub. v2.0.0

scripts.create: aws lambda create-function --function-name genie-renderer --runtime nodejs18.x --zip-file fileb://genie-renderer.zip --handler ./build/index.renderer
scripts.aws-us: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name GenieRenderer --zip-file fileb://genie-renderer.zip --profile genie-hub-active --region us-west-1
scripts.create-us: aws lambda create-function --function-name GenieRenderer --runtime nodejs18.x --zip-file fileb://genie-renderer.zip --handler ./build/index.js --profile genie-hub-active --role arn:aws:iam::199352526440:role/genie_renderer --region us-west-1

author: Dynamic Array Ltd
